translation.en: Hold all my calls.
translation.zh: 老板正在忙

translation.en: ♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞节

translation.en: ♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞节

translation.en: ♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞节

translation.en: Girls, it's time.
translation.zh: 姑娘们 时间到了

translation.en: Dad, no.
translation.zh: 爸爸 不

translation.en: I have to keep feeding the Christmas Panda or the Panda will die.
translation.zh: 我要一直给圣诞熊猫吃东西不然它就会饿死的

translation.en: [gasps] His death is on your conscience. I hope bedtime was worth it.
translation.zh: 我要一直给圣诞熊猫吃东西不然它就会饿死的 它的死是你的错但愿睡觉比它更重要

translation.en: Who said bedtime?
translation.zh: 谁说要睡觉了？

translation.en: It's time for the grand finale of Templeton Christmas Traditions.
translation.zh: 该开始天普顿家圣诞传统的终极环节了

translation.en: Dad tells a holiday-themed story until you fall asleep. Whoo!
translation.zh: 爸爸来讲一个节日主题的故事一直讲到你睡着

translation.en: Do we have to? I'm in the middle of something.
translation.zh: 必须讲吗？我正忙着呢

translation.en: Christmas, Christmas, Christmas-- Hey.
translation.zh: 圣诞节 嘿

translation.en: Why do we have to do something just because it's a tradition?
translation.zh: 因为某件事是传统 就非得做吗？

translation.en: I know someone who felt the same way you did.
translation.zh: 我认识一个人 跟你想的一样

translation.en: Who? Do I know them? Do they have a beard?
translation.zh: 是谁？我认识他们吗？他们有胡子吗？

translation.en: Or a curse that makes them sing?
translation.zh: 还是一个让他们唱歌的咒语？

translation.en: It was actually your Uncle Ted.
translation.zh: 他就是你的泰德叔叔

translation.en: And once upon a time...
translation.zh: 很久以前…

translation.en: Sneaky story intro.
translation.zh: 非常狡猾的故事引入

translation.en: When he was a baby, he hated our Christmas traditions,
translation.zh: 他小的时候很讨厌圣诞节传统

translation.en: even though they were the most awesome traditions ever.
translation.zh: 虽然那是最棒的传统

translation.en: Five days before Christmas, we played...
translation.zh: 圣诞节的前五天 我们玩…

translation.en: [all] Shock That Elf.
translation.zh: 吓唬小精灵

translation.en: -It's your dad's year to be the elf. -All right.
translation.zh: -今年该你们的爸爸当小精灵了-好的

translation.en: But me and my elf buddy here are pretty hard to--
translation.zh: 但是我和我的精灵搭档可是很难…

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -[shouts]
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: [adult Tim] Four days before Christmas, we'd make cards for our grandparents.
translation.zh: 圣诞节的前四天我们要给爷爷奶奶做卡片

translation.en: A Christmas tree.
translation.zh: 一棵圣诞树

translation.en: A reindeer.
translation.zh: 一只驯鹿

translation.en: The baby made Santa's sleigh.
translation.zh: 宝宝画了圣诞老人的雪橇

translation.en: [adult Tim] Three days before Christmas, we'd sing the most soulful
translation.zh: 圣诞节的前三天 我们会唱最深情的低音和钟琴版的

translation.en: bass-and-glockenspiel rendition
translation.zh: 我们会唱最深情的低音和钟琴版的

translation.en: of "The Night Before Christmas" you've ever heard.
translation.zh: “圣诞前夜”

translation.en: ♪ 'Twas the night before Christmas And all through the house ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞节前夜 家里好安静

translation.en: ♪ Not a creature was stirring Not even a mouse ♪
translation.zh: 就连小老鼠 都不出声音

translation.en: [adult Tim] Two days before Uncle Ted's first Christmas,
translation.zh: 在泰德叔叔的第一个圣诞节的前两天

translation.en: that's when the magic started.
translation.zh: 魔法开始显现了

translation.en: Work with me, baby.
translation.zh: 配合一下吧 宝贝

translation.en: Aw, there. Our handsome little elf.
translation.zh: 好了 我们帅气的小精灵

translation.en: Ooh! I'm gonna grab the camera.
translation.zh: 我去拿相机

translation.en: I thought Christmas was a day, not a month.
translation.zh: 我以为圣诞节是一天 而不是一个月

translation.en: You can't contain Templeton traditions to one day.
translation.zh: 天普顿家的传统不能集中在一天

translation.en: That's like trying to hold eight ants. Too many ants.
translation.zh: 就好像想用一只手抓着八只蚂蚁蚂蚁太多了

translation.en: You performed "The Night Before Christmas" three days before.
translation.zh: 你三天前就演唱过“圣诞前夜”了

translation.en: Performing it on the actual night before Christmas is bad luck.
translation.zh: 在真正的圣诞节前夜演唱它会倒霉的

translation.en: Uh, you put a gingerbread fellow in my pocket?
translation.zh: 你在我的口袋里放了姜饼人？

translation.en: Because it is good luck.
translation.zh: 因为这能带来好运

translation.en: And yet I'm still here,
translation.zh: 可是我还在这里

translation.en: wearing this.
translation.zh: 戴着这个

translation.en: Where's yours?
translation.zh: 你的呢？

translation.en: Not participating in today's "dress like a court jester" tradition?
translation.zh: 你不参与今天的“打扮成宫廷小丑”的传统吗？

translation.en: That's not today's tradition. We--
translation.zh: 那不是今天的传统 我们…

translation.en: Who's ready to get their pictures taken with Santa?
translation.zh: 谁准备好跟圣诞老人合影了？

translation.en: I'll be right there with you the whole time.
translation.zh: 我会全程陪着你的

translation.en: We sit on his lap, tell him what we want.
translation.zh: 我们坐到他腿上 告诉他我们的愿望

translation.en: It's the easiest and best tradition. You don't have to freak out.
translation.zh: 这是最简单也是最好的传统你不用害怕

translation.en: Danny?
translation.zh: 丹尼？

translation.en: Tim, check this out.
translation.zh: 蒂姆 快来看

translation.en: A snowball?
translation.zh: 一个雪球？

translation.en: I'm gonna throw it in Santa's face.
translation.zh: 我要把它扔到圣诞老人的脸上

translation.en: What? You'll get on the naughty list.
translation.zh: 什么？你会被列到淘气名单上的

translation.en: Oh, I'm always on the naughty list.
translation.zh: 我总是在淘气名单上

translation.en: I don't give old Kringle the power to suppress my animal instincts.
translation.zh: 我不会让老克林格尔得到压制我的动物本能的权力

translation.en: But only good kids get presents.
translation.zh: 可是只有乖孩子才会得到礼物

translation.en: Do only they?
translation.zh: 只有他们吗？

translation.en: Naughty-listers get the greatest present of all, coal.
translation.zh: 淘气的孩子会得到最棒的礼物 煤炭

translation.en: The black rock with a million uses.
translation.zh: 多功能黑石头

translation.en: Heat, decoration, other. It's a win-win.
translation.zh: 加热 装饰 以及其他的用途 是双赢

translation.en: Want me to split this in two? We can totally flank Santa.
translation.zh: 想让我把它分成两个吗？我们会吓圣诞老人一大跳

translation.en: No, I work hard to stay on the nice list.
translation.zh: 不我很努力地想要留在乖孩子名单上

translation.en: Who do you think gave them quarters for massages?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们投进按摩椅的硬币是谁给的？

translation.en: Suit yourself.
translation.zh: 随便你吧

translation.en: We should probably get up.
translation.zh: 我们该起来了吧

translation.en: I've been trying to.
translation.zh: 我一直在努力

translation.en: Come on up.
translation.zh: 快过来吧

translation.en: Timothy Templeton. Four T's in it.
translation.zh: 提摩西天普顿 名字里有四个T

translation.en: This is Theodore. Same last name, one less T.
translation.zh: 他是西奥多 相同的姓氏 少一个T

translation.en: Boss Baby.
translation.zh: 小老板

translation.en: Ron.
translation.zh: 罗恩

translation.en: Um, what is happening?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: We used to work together, a long time ago.
translation.zh: 我们很久以前是同事

translation.en: Wait, Santa is--
translation.zh: 等等 圣诞老人是…

translation.en: Former Baby Corp.
translation.zh: 前任宝贝企业

translation.en: As disloyal as a cat with trade secrets to sell.
translation.zh: 像猫一样不忠诚 贩卖情报

translation.en: Oh, Boss Baby.
translation.zh: 哦 小老板

translation.en: I'm just trying to spread joy and happiness.
translation.zh: 我只不过想分享快乐和幸福

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah. I heard it all the day you quit. When will Mommy and Daddy take a picture?
translation.zh: 我听说你辞职了 罗恩爸爸妈妈什么时候来拍照？

translation.en: -Honey, take a picture. -I'm trying, I'm just so relaxed.
translation.zh: -亲爱的 拍照片-我在努力 我只是太放松了

translation.en: I left Baby Corp because I had this idea
translation.zh: 我离开宝贝企业是因为我有个想法

translation.en: of how to make the world a happier place with Christmas cheer.
translation.zh: 让这个世界因为圣诞节的欢乐变得更快乐

translation.en: Think it's working?
translation.zh: 你觉得不好吗？

translation.en: You're doing fine.
translation.zh: 我觉得你做得很好

translation.en: Don't side with this hippie.
translation.zh: 别和这个嬉皮士站在一边

translation.en: He betrayed everything Baby Corp stands for.
translation.zh: 他背叛了宝贝企业的宗旨

translation.en: He poached half the company for his toys-for-nothing program.
translation.zh: 为了这个白送礼物的项目他把公司一半的人挖走

translation.en: And he's exploiting baby labor to make those toys.
translation.zh: 他还压榨童工来制造玩具

translation.en: Elves. Elves make the toys.
translation.zh: 是精灵 是精灵们在造玩具

translation.en: Oh, come on. That's just marketing.
translation.zh: 得了 那就是市场宣传

translation.en: Whoa, they are babies?
translation.zh: 哇 他们是宝贝？

translation.en: -Okay, say cheese. -Cheese.
translation.zh: -好了 茄子-茄子

translation.en: Smile for your parents.
translation.zh: 冲着你的爸爸妈妈微笑

translation.en: I will never be caught smiling with a commie like--
translation.zh: 我永远不会和这个傻瓜一起微笑的…

translation.en: Gotcha.
translation.zh: 笑了吧

translation.en: -[grunting] -I'm on the nice list, right?
translation.zh: 我是乖孩子名单上的 对吧？

translation.en: Tippy top.
translation.zh: 排名靠前

translation.en: Yes. For Christmas, I want Football Mike Canadian Football Edition
translation.zh: 好的 圣诞节礼物我想要橄榄球麦克加拿大橄榄球版

translation.en: with the locker room Jacuzzi playset.
translation.zh: 带更衣室按摩浴缸

translation.en: You write that request in official letter form?
translation.zh: 你用正式信件写的请求？

translation.en: Now he loves paperwork.
translation.zh: 现在他喜欢书面信件了

translation.en: You know it.
translation.zh: 你知道的

translation.en: Drop it off with my elves, and have a Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 把它给我的精灵们 祝你圣诞节快乐

translation.en: Thanks, Santa. You too, bye.
translation.zh: 多谢 圣诞老人 你也是 拜拜

translation.en: I see you, Danny Petrosky.
translation.zh: 我看到你了 丹尼佩卓斯基

translation.en: Naughty list life forever.
translation.zh: 永远是淘气名单上的常客

translation.en: See? Wasn't that fun, little guy?
translation.zh: 看见了吗？那不是很有趣吗 小家伙？

translation.en: Look, Cracklin' Bones O'Dell and the Caroling Cracklettes.
translation.zh: 看哪 好漂亮呀

translation.en: Put me down. I have a score to settle.
translation.zh: 把我放下来 我有事要处理

translation.en: You won't do anything to get me on the naughty list?
translation.zh: 你不会害我上淘气名单吧？

translation.en: I'm not a monster, Templeton.
translation.zh: 我又不是怪兽 天普顿

translation.en: Santa Claus is.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人才是

translation.en: So, Ron, you like getting mail?
translation.zh: 罗恩 你不是喜欢邮件吗？

translation.en: Well, here's a special delivery.
translation.zh: 给你一份特殊快递

translation.en: Not like you to be sleeping on the job on Christmas Eve, Dongle.
translation.zh: 在平安夜工作时打瞌睡可不像你铛戈

translation.en: It's Christmas Eve? Where am--? Oh!
translation.zh: 今天是平安夜？我在哪…？

translation.en: You still owe me 300 hollyberries, Dongle. Pay up.
translation.zh: 你还欠我三百冬青果 铛戈 快干活

translation.en: Why are you calling me--? Where--?
translation.zh: 你为什么叫我…？这是哪…？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 不

translation.en: Don't play dumb, Dongle.
translation.zh: 别装傻了 铛戈

translation.en: I want my money before Boxing Day. Get it?
translation.zh: 我要在节礼日前拿到我的钱 懂吗？

translation.en: Do get it. Not Dongle.
translation.zh: 明白 我不是铛戈

translation.en: Dongle! I'm so jolly to see you.
translation.zh: 铛戈 见到你我太高兴了

translation.en: Not Dongle.
translation.zh: 不是铛戈

translation.en: What's up with your voice, Dongle? Are you sick?
translation.zh: 你的声音怎么了 铛戈？你病了吗？

translation.en: I'm not Dongle.
translation.zh: 我不是铛戈

translation.en: Everybody, come quick.
translation.zh: 所有人快过来

translation.en: Dongle's sick.
translation.zh: 铛戈病了

translation.en: Dongle.
translation.zh: 铛戈

translation.en: Can you see? Look at me.
translation.zh: 你能看见吗？看着我

translation.en: I'm not Dongle!
translation.zh: 我不是铛戈

translation.en: [Tim] It's Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 今天是平安夜

translation.en: -You'll love it. -Santa, Dongle is sorry for sleep--
translation.zh: -你会喜欢的-圣诞老人 铛戈很抱歉睡…

translation.en: -What did you do with my brother? -What did you do with Santa?
translation.zh: -你对我的弟弟做了什么？-你对圣诞老人做了什么？

translation.en: Oh, no. Are you...?
translation.zh: 哦 不 你是…？

translation.en: Dongle's name is Ding Dong Dongle.
translation.zh: 铛戈的名字叫叮当铛戈

translation.en: Yeah, but you're an elf?
translation.zh: 我知道 可是你是精灵吗？

translation.en: Superior toymaker of the North Pole.
translation.zh: 北极的超级礼物制造者

translation.en: When Dongle makes a toy, so many jaws drop to the floor
translation.zh: 铛戈做的礼物会让所有人惊掉下巴

translation.en: that the jaw doctor can buy a new mansion.
translation.zh: 治疗下巴的医生赚的钱都能买豪宅了

translation.en: You made a rocking horse from the crib?
translation.zh: 你用婴儿床做了一只摇晃木马？

translation.en: Is it perfect?
translation.zh: 是不是很完美？

translation.en: Then yes.
translation.zh: 那就是了

translation.en: Wait, so if you're here, then my brother is...
translation.zh: 等等 如果你在这儿 那我的弟弟…

translation.en: At the North Pole, of course. Does Dongle look like he is from Texas?
translation.zh: 当然是在北极了铛戈看上去像是德州来的吗？

translation.en: Imagine cowboy hat Dongle.
translation.zh: 想象一下铛戈带着牛仔帽

translation.en: Very handsome.
translation.zh: 很帅的

translation.en: So he's with Santa? Aw.
translation.zh: 他和圣诞老人在一起？

translation.en: We gotta get him back now.
translation.zh: 我们要马上接他回来

translation.en: It's his first Christmas. We have more traditions he has to do.
translation.zh: 这是他的第一个圣诞节我们还有很多传统节目要做呢

translation.en: Dongle needs to get back now.
translation.zh: 铛戈要马上回去

translation.en: Or the world will be bombarded with inferior toys
translation.zh: 否则这个世界就会收到不合格的礼物

translation.en: that blacken children's hearts.
translation.zh: 孩子们会伤心的

translation.en: My brother works at Baby Corp, so all we--
translation.zh: 我的弟弟在宝贝企业工作所以我们…

translation.en: Baby Corp. Can't make toys to save their lives.
translation.zh: 宝贝企业 不能制造玩具来拯救他们

translation.en: Does that situation come up a lot?
translation.zh: 这种情况经常发生吗？

translation.en: Dongle could tell you stories.
translation.zh: 铛戈有很多故事可以分享

translation.en: Yes, please. But later.
translation.zh: 好吧 以后再说吧

translation.en: Baby Corp is our only hope to get out of this.
translation.zh: 宝贝企业是解决这个问题的唯一希望

translation.en: Jimbo, Staci, we have a situation.
translation.zh: 金宝 史黛西 我们有麻烦了

translation.en: T-W-A-F-E-R.
translation.zh: 汤 想 消 红

translation.en: TWAFER.
translation.zh: 汤想消红

translation.en: "Tommy wants a fire engine, red."
translation.zh: “汤米想要消防车 红色”

translation.en: -TWAFER. TWAFER. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 汤想消红

translation.en: Not now, Dongle.
translation.zh: 现在不行 铛戈

translation.en: I'm not Dongle, Ron.
translation.zh: 我不是铛戈 罗恩

translation.en: Boss Baby? What the jingles are you doing here?
translation.zh: 小老板？你在这儿干什么？

translation.en: The question is, how the jingles do I get out of here?
translation.zh: 问题是我要怎么离开这里？

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing letters.
translation.zh: 我想帮你 可是我在记住这些信件

translation.en: If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.zh: 如果记不住他们的要求我就要花几个星期送礼物

translation.en: Speaking of jingles, "jingle."
translation.zh: 说到“叮叮当”

translation.en: "Judy is now getting lavender earmuffs." J-I-N-G-L-E. JINGLE.
translation.zh: “朱迪想要薰衣草耳罩”叮叮当

translation.en: You're an embarrassment to efficiency. Get a computer.
translation.zh: 你真是效率的羞耻 买一台电脑吧

translation.en: The elves and I are like a family business.
translation.zh: 我和精灵们就像家族生意

translation.en: They make the toys, I do this.
translation.zh: 他们制造礼物 我负责这个

translation.en: These are our family traditions,
translation.zh: 这是我们的家族传统

translation.en: and they've made everyone happy for a long time.
translation.zh: 长久以来大家都很满意

translation.en: Yay for your family. Take me home to mine, Big Beard.
translation.zh: 你的家族真不错让我回自己的家 大胡子

translation.en: I'm busy. I'll take you tonight when I deliver presents.
translation.zh: 我很忙今晚我送礼物的时候把你捎回家

translation.en: What do I do in the meantime?
translation.zh: 那我现在干什么？

translation.en: Help make a few toys,
translation.zh: 帮忙制造几个玩具

translation.en: and maybe learn about the Christmas spirit.
translation.zh: 也可以学学圣诞节精神

translation.en: -Any word on rescuing my brother? -Sorry, ran into a snag.
translation.zh: -拯救我弟弟的事有消息了吗？-对不起 遇到点阻碍

translation.en: Typical Baby Corp incompetence.
translation.zh: 典型的宝贝企业的无能表现

translation.en: Typical Dongle excellence.
translation.zh: 典型的铛戈优秀表现

translation.en: I won that trophy for excellence in trophy modeling.
translation.zh: 那是我在奖杯造型大赛中获的奖

translation.en: Stop making stuff out of stuff. What's the snag?
translation.zh: 别再用东西制造东西了阻碍是什么？

translation.en: Chupie tech is jammed at the North Pole. Stupid Santa Claus.
translation.zh: 北极的丘比技术出故障了笨蛋圣诞老人

translation.en: Watch your mouth, Baby Corp mongrel.
translation.zh: 小心你说的话 宝贝企业的小坏蛋

translation.en: It's less than 24 hours until my brother's first Christmas.
translation.zh: 距离我弟弟的第一个圣诞节还有不到24个小时

translation.en: If we can't chupie there, we have to find another way.
translation.zh: 如果不能成功 我们得另外想办法

translation.en: Mom and Dad will be worried sick.
translation.zh: 爸爸妈妈会很担心的

translation.en: You relax. Dongle will take care of everything.
translation.zh: 别担心 铛戈会处理好的

translation.en: This one's from Aunt Dorothy. "Merry Christmas from Aunt Dorothy."
translation.zh: 这个是多萝西婶婶送的“来自多萝西婶婶的圣诞祝福”

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
translation.zh: 哦 真贴心

translation.en: Is that a grenade?
translation.zh: 那是手榴弹吗？

translation.en: Don't be foolish. Dongle doesn't explode parents.
translation.zh: 别傻了 铛戈不会把家长炸飞的

translation.en: Dongle kills with poison gas.
translation.zh: 铛戈喜欢用毒气

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Mom] Do you smell?
translation.zh: 你闻到了吗？

translation.en: Dongle told a sick joke.
translation.zh: 铛戈开了一个淘气的玩笑

translation.en: This is Santa's sleeping dust for when the children stay up to see him.
translation.zh: 这是给熬夜想见圣诞老人的孩子们准备的睡眠灰尘

translation.en: What the heck?
translation.zh: 你怎么回事？

translation.en: Drama is the spice of life.
translation.zh: 生活需要一点乐趣

translation.en: Should give us time to get to the North Pole and back.
translation.zh: 应该够我们来回一趟北极了

translation.en: But with them asleep,
translation.zh: 可是他们睡着以后

translation.en: I have to do the shopping for our traditional fruitcake hockey.
translation.zh: 我就得为我们的传统水果蛋糕曲棍球买材料了

translation.en: Which we play while wearing Hawaiian leis made from snacks. So fun.
translation.zh: 我们会戴上用零食做成的夏威夷花环很好玩

translation.en: Point is, we need to move fast.
translation.zh: 重点是 我们得速战速决

translation.en: No sweat. Santa has magic portals in every mall.
translation.zh: 不用急圣诞老人有直通所有商场的快速通道

translation.en: They appear every night after business hours,
translation.zh: 每天营业结束以后就会出现

translation.en: but only until 9 a.m. the day before Christmas.
translation.zh: 但是圣诞节前一天只到早上9点

translation.en: We have 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 我们还有20分钟

translation.en: Why didn't you tell us before?
translation.zh: 你为什么不早点告诉我们？

translation.en: Were you not paying attention when Dongle told you drama is the spice of life?
translation.zh: 铛戈说生活需乐趣的时候你没认真听吗？

translation.en: So this is where Christmas comes from?
translation.zh: 这里就是圣诞节的来源？

translation.en: You bet.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: We got Jingly Jangly there doing wrapping paper design.
translation.zh: 清铃珍莉在那里设计包装纸

translation.en: Ribbon testing with Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.zh: 踢皮塔皮疏落皮测试彩带

translation.en: Okay, okay, that one is good.
translation.zh: 好了 这个不错

translation.en: [PoopyDoopy] Lala Doo-Da and Diddly Doo write all the best carols.
translation.zh: 拉拉杜达和滴滴里嘟创作圣诞节颂歌

translation.en: What kind of nog-house open-mic garbage is that?
translation.zh: 你弹的是什么垃圾？

translation.en: You wouldn't know a hit if it knocked your tooth out.
translation.zh: 你这种人欣赏不了

translation.en: And of course, toy-making with me, PoopyDoopy, filling in for Dongle.
translation.zh: 当然了 还有我顶替铛戈制作玩具

translation.en: I admire your skill.
translation.zh: 我欣赏你的手艺

translation.en: Why thank you.
translation.zh: 多谢

translation.en: But I can't help noticing inefficiencies in your systems.
translation.zh: 可是我注意到你们的系统效率很低

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I notice you make all your gingerbread from the eggs of a single goose?
translation.zh: 我注意到你们的姜饼用的都是一只鹅下的蛋

translation.en: That's not just a goose. She's Ginger the Gingergoose.
translation.zh: 它不是普通的鹅 是姜饼鹅

translation.en: Sure. And dare I ask a follow-up?
translation.zh: 好吧 我能再追加一个问题吗？

translation.en: Why have those elves been rubbing gumdrops on the egg for two hours?
translation.zh: 为什么那些小精灵在那只蛋上摩擦了两个小时？

translation.en: To make it the best gingerbread in the whole world.
translation.zh: 为了制造全世界最棒的姜饼

translation.en: Dubious claim.
translation.zh: 深表怀疑

translation.en: Try this.
translation.zh: 试试这个

translation.en: This is really good. What's the secret?
translation.zh: 真好吃呀 秘诀是什么？

translation.en: It's made with store-bought chicken eggs and was stuffed in my pocket.
translation.zh: 它是用超市买的鸡蛋做的昨天就在我的口袋里了

translation.en: [all] Delicious.
translation.zh: 真好吃

translation.en: You guys get it now?
translation.zh: 你们明白了吗？

translation.en: We need to put our gingerbread in your pocket.
translation.zh: 我们得把姜饼在你的口袋里放两天

translation.en: No, my point is efficiency.
translation.zh: 不 我说的是效率

translation.en: You can't mess up gingerbread. Just crack eggs in some batter.
translation.zh: 姜饼不难做 把鸡蛋打进面糊里

translation.en: Why does this goose even have a job, right, Ginger?
translation.zh: 为什么给这只鹅一份工作呢？

translation.en: -[squawks] -What else needs fixing around here?
translation.zh: 这里还有什么需要提高？

translation.en: You're watching paint dry? I thought you were on a deadline.
translation.zh: 你们在盯着油漆变干？我还以为你们在赶时间呢

translation.en: -We take pride in our wrapping paper. -Just to be torn open?
translation.zh: -我们以包装纸为骄傲-只是为了被撕开？

translation.en: You're wasting time.
translation.zh: 你们在浪费时间

translation.en: But this is the way we've always done things.
translation.zh: 可是我们一直都是这样做的

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.zh: 以后不是了

translation.en: Boom, efficiency. Hit me with another one.
translation.zh: 砰 效率 再来一个任务

translation.en: Carol writers, right?
translation.zh: 圣诞颂歌创作者？

translation.en: Supposed to be.
translation.zh: 理应是

translation.en: But Diddly Doo overdid it on the milk and cookies again.
translation.zh: 可是滴滴里嘟又把牛奶和饼干弄洒了

translation.en: Well, excuse me, Mother.
translation.zh: 请原谅我 妈妈

translation.en: You ever feel like working?
translation.zh: 你有过工作的状态吗？

translation.en: We'll work when I tell you.
translation.zh: 什么时候开工我说了算

translation.en: If I can make a suggestion-- Oh!
translation.zh: 如果我能提个建议…

translation.en: [both] Don't mess with our creative process.
translation.zh: 不要扰乱我们的创作程序

translation.en: You've got the talent of a wreath.
translation.zh: 你毫无天赋

translation.en: They're fine. What else you got?
translation.zh: 他们很好 你还有什么本事？

translation.en: I'm not laughing. Toss it.
translation.zh: 不好笑 扔了吧

translation.en: Spin me up on this nonsense.
translation.zh: 给我解释一下

translation.en: Everyone knows, ribbon is no good if it doesn't tickle me.
translation.zh: 大家都知道不能让我笑的彩带不是好彩带

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
translation.zh: 我不能苟同

translation.en: Oh, but it is.
translation.zh: 事实就是这样

translation.en: No, it's not.
translation.zh: 不是的

translation.en: Pretty sure it is.
translation.zh: 就是

translation.en: He's a genius.
translation.zh: 他是个天才

translation.en: Could it be, everything we've been doing has been wrong?
translation.zh: 我们以前做的一切都是错的吗？

translation.en: No telling, but yes.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: Please, walk with me.
translation.zh: 请跟我来

translation.en: [gasps] A walk-and-talk? You're getting the hang of this efficiency thing.
translation.zh: 边走边谈？你们开始意识到效率的意义了

translation.en: You're telling me.
translation.zh: 你说呢？

translation.en: You've been here an hour, and our productivity is up 20 percent.
translation.zh: 你才来了一个小时我们的效率就提高了百分之二十

translation.en: We might actually get a nog break before Santa leaves.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人出发之前我们也许还能休息一下

translation.en: Why settle for nog? Imagine what else you could have.
translation.zh: 为什么休息？想象一下这段时间能干多少事

translation.en: Computers for naughty/nice cross-reference.
translation.zh: 计算机对淘气包和乖宝宝进行分类

translation.en: Industrial ovens for mass gingerbread baking.
translation.zh: 工业烤箱批量制作姜饼

translation.en: Break rooms full of gumdrop delights.
translation.zh: 休息室里都是好吃的泡泡糖

translation.en: And of course, mahogany crafters' lamps.
translation.zh: 当然了 还有红木工匠灯

translation.en: Yes, to ward off snow monsters.
translation.zh: 能够吓退雪兽

translation.en: Mahogany lamps ward off snow monsters?
translation.zh: 红木灯能吓退雪兽？

translation.en: Mahogany does.
translation.zh: 红木可以

translation.en: Weird, I was just trying to class up the joint.
translation.zh: 奇怪 我不过是想提高一下档次

translation.en: We should redo this entire floor in mahogany.
translation.zh: 我们应该铺上红木地板

translation.en: Mahogany? No. Why?
translation.zh: 红木？不 为什么？

translation.en: It'd help Christmas cheer if no one was eaten by a snow monster.
translation.zh: 如果没有人被雪兽吃掉那一定能增加圣诞节的气氛

translation.en: These reforms will take an upfront investment.
translation.zh: 这些改造是高回报的投资

translation.en: What's your cash on hand?
translation.zh: 你手头有多少现金？

translation.en: Fifty trillion hollyberries.
translation.zh: 五十万亿冬青果

translation.en: -In dollars? -Seven.
translation.zh: -换成美元呢？-七块钱

translation.en: Okay, we need to raise revenue.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们得提高收入

translation.en: What do you charge to get on the nice list?
translation.zh: 要想上乖孩子名单 需要多少钱？

translation.en: The only charge is being the best you can-- [Boss Baby] Honk, honk.
translation.zh: 只需要尽力做到最好…

translation.en: You sillies are practically feeding cash to the reindeer.
translation.zh: 你们这帮傻瓜 简直把钱都喂驯鹿了

translation.en: But it's always been free.
translation.zh: 可是一直都是免费的呀

translation.en: And your boss always wears a red suit to a home invasion.
translation.zh: 你们的老板一直都穿着红衣服闯入别人家

translation.en: Tradition's a dumb reason to do anything.
translation.zh: 传统是件愚蠢的事

translation.en: You're running a business that's stalled out below its potential.
translation.zh: 你们没有发挥生意的最大潜力

translation.en: It's killing my soul.
translation.zh: 这太让我难受了

translation.en: But good news?
translation.zh: 好消息是？

translation.en: You've got me.
translation.zh: 你们有我

translation.en: The portal.
translation.zh: 通道

translation.en: What? Yes. Hurry up, let's go.
translation.zh: 什么？对 快 出发

translation.en: Unmade toys, Dongle is coming.
translation.zh: 未完成的玩具 铛戈来了

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: You had to stop at the snack cart?
translation.zh: 你非得在零食车停下吗？

translation.en: I'm pulling double duty.
translation.zh: 我现在有两项任务在身

translation.en: I have to rescue my brother and keep my family traditions from dying.
translation.zh: 我要营救我的弟弟还要挽救我们家的传统

translation.en: Stop being so dramatic. There has to be a simple solution.
translation.zh: 别这么夸张了肯定有简单的解决方法

translation.en: Four plane tickets to the North Pole.
translation.zh: 四张去北极的机票

translation.en: Great. Does anyone have $11,000?
translation.zh: 很好 谁有11000块？

translation.en: I have 700 hollyberries.
translation.zh: 我有七百冬青果

translation.en: I had to buy a winter hat.
translation.zh: 我要买一顶冬天的帽子

translation.en: I only have 10K five hunny.
translation.zh: 我只有一万零五百

translation.en: So close.
translation.zh: 就差一点

translation.en: Look, super speedy delivery.
translation.zh: 看 极速快递

translation.en: "Santa letters and packages delivered to the North Pole before midnight"?
translation.zh: “圣诞老人的信件和包裹在午夜之前送达北极”？

translation.en: We follow the next delivery truck to the airport,
translation.zh: 我们跟着下一趟快递车去机场

translation.en: sneak on a jet disguised as food-service workers.
translation.zh: 装成送餐人员混上飞机

translation.en: When the crew asks, "Is that low-fat?"
translation.zh: 如果有乘务员问“是低脂餐吗？”

translation.en: I go, "No, it's high fist."
translation.zh: 我会说“不 是高拳头餐”

translation.en: Double thumpers into a roundhouse kick.
translation.zh: 先给两拳 再来一个回旋踢

translation.en: We've put two on the ground, because I'm good at kicking.
translation.zh: 撂倒两个 因为我的腿上功夫了得

translation.en: But we can't control the cockpit until we defeat six crooked co-pilots,
translation.zh: 但是要先打败六个副驾驶我们才能控制驾驶舱

translation.en: each trained in a deadly martial art.
translation.zh: 每一个都是武艺高强

translation.en: My plan was better.
translation.zh: 我的计划更好

translation.en: Oh! Watch your elbows, Jimbo.
translation.zh: 小心你的肘关节 金宝

translation.en: [Tim] Dongle, don't eat all my snacks.
translation.zh: 铛戈 别把我的零食都吃了

translation.en: -[Dongle] Dongle is not eating anything. -[chewing]
translation.zh: 铛戈什么也没吃

translation.en: I hear little Chloe is on the naughty list...
translation.zh: 我听说小克罗伊在淘气名单上…

translation.en: What's it worth to you to get Josie into nice?
translation.zh: 你想花多少钱让乔希上乖孩子名单？

translation.en: Start Scooter on the $50 nice package...
translation.zh: 给史古特50块的乖孩子套餐…

translation.en: Isn't everything more beautiful when it's profitable?
translation.zh: 有了盈利 一切不是更美好了吗？

translation.en: This makes me feel yucky,
translation.zh: 我感觉很恶心

translation.en: like a sticky candy cane that fell on a floor.
translation.zh: 就像一颗糖黏在了地板上

translation.en: Remember, you're helping to finance more efficient toy-making.
translation.zh: 记住你在为效率更高的玩具制造集资

translation.en: Things are looking up for your compensation.
translation.zh: 你会得到更多的回报

translation.en: We're gonna get more Christmas cheer?
translation.zh: 我们会得到更多的圣诞欢乐？

translation.en: -You get paid in Christmas cheer? -I wish.
translation.zh: -你的报酬是用圣诞欢乐来支付的？-我倒是希望

translation.en: We get paid in twinkly smiles,
translation.zh: 我们获得了闪闪微笑

translation.en: which can be exchanged for Christmas cheer.
translation.zh: 可以交换圣诞欢乐

translation.en: You have to trade in at the Santa shop.
translation.zh: 必须在圣诞老人店进行交换

translation.en: They're only open for a half-hour on Thursdays.
translation.zh: 只在周四营业半个小时

translation.en: Unless you send your smiles by penguin messenger, which takes months.
translation.zh: 除非你派企鹅信使送微笑那要花上几个月

translation.en: What kind of hustle is Santa running on you?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人对你们施了什么咒？

translation.en: We love Santa. We're like a family business.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢圣诞老人我们就像家族生意

translation.en: Are you? I know Dasher and Dancer and Prancer and Vixen.
translation.zh: 是吗？我知道猛冲、舞者、欢欣和妇女四只驯鹿

translation.en: All the reindeer do for 364 days a year is eat grass and poop.
translation.zh: 一年中的364天 驯鹿只会吃草和拉屎

translation.en: You elves do all the work, and I couldn't name one of you.
translation.zh: 活儿都是你们精灵干的我却不知道你们的名字

translation.en: Except you, DookiePoops.
translation.zh: 除了你 多比波比

translation.en: -PoopyDoopy. -Forget how things have always been done.
translation.zh: -波比多比-把过去的传统都忘了吧

translation.en: What do you deserve right now?
translation.zh: 你们现在应该得到什么？

translation.en: I would like a little recognition.
translation.zh: 我需要一点认可

translation.en: [all] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -Right. -We should talk to Santa.
translation.zh: -没错-我们应该跟圣诞老人谈谈

translation.en: [man 1] Last delivery for the season.
translation.zh: 今年最后一次快递

translation.en: [man 2] Put it there, right next to the gigantic pile of letters.
translation.zh: 放在那儿 放在那一大堆信的旁边

translation.en: -[man 1] Merry Chri-- -[door closes]
translation.zh: 圣诞快…

translation.en: We're here.
translation.zh: 我们到了

translation.en: Good. Dongle is hungry.
translation.zh: 很好 铛戈饿了

translation.en: Even though Dongle did not eat the snacks.
translation.zh: 虽然铛戈没有吃零食

translation.en: Uh, you aren't letters to Santa. I'm disappointed.
translation.zh: 你们不是给圣诞老人的信 我很失望

translation.en: But I like feeling disappointed, so mixed bag.
translation.zh: 但是我喜欢失望的感觉所以喜忧参半吧

translation.en: Remove your funeral suit, sad vampire.
translation.zh: 换掉你的葬礼服吧 悲伤的吸血鬼

translation.en: Dongle is here.
translation.zh: 铛戈在此

translation.en: Is this the North Pole?
translation.zh: 这里是北极吗？

translation.en: "North Pole." Yay, we're here.
translation.zh: “北极” 太好了 我们到了

translation.en: [Tim] It says "Noth Pole." You left out the R.
translation.zh: 上面写的是“诺斯波”你少写了R

translation.en: At least I didn't write it backwards. We could've ended up in Elop Htron.
translation.zh: 至少我没有倒着写否则我们现在就到“极北”了

translation.en: This is the Noth Pole?
translation.zh: 这里是诺斯波？

translation.en: I'm the Noth Pole. That's my name.
translation.zh: 我是诺斯波 这是我的名字

translation.en: I changed it so all the letters to Santa with that misspelled word come to me.
translation.zh: 我改了名字 这样所有要给圣诞老人却写错地址的信都会寄给我

translation.en: It's thrilling.
translation.zh: 太激动了

translation.en: That's a weird thing to be excited about.
translation.zh: 为这种事激动有点奇怪吧

translation.en: Why? This is a pile of hopes and dreams
translation.zh: 为什么？这些希望和梦想

translation.en: I can sell to collectors for a lot of money.
translation.zh: 可以卖给收藏家赚大钱

translation.en: We need to get to the North Pole. And quick. Is that possible?
translation.zh: 我们需要去北极 要快点去 可能吗？

translation.en: It's a 30-minute chartered jet ride.
translation.zh: 30分钟的包机飞行

translation.en: I can make anything happen.
translation.zh: 我能办到 我什么都能办到

translation.en: I'm Noth Pole.
translation.zh: 我可是诺斯波

translation.en: -Yay. -[Noth] But I won't.
translation.zh: -太好了-但是不行

translation.en: I don't really feel like it. Don't touch my pile.
translation.zh: 我不想 别碰我的东西

translation.en: Dongle touched nothing.
translation.zh: 铛戈什么也没碰

translation.en: These letters go for a fortune in Tokyo, along with gum chewed by politicians,
translation.zh: 和政治家们嚼过的口香糖以及活动房屋制造商的设计蓝图一起

translation.en: industrial blueprints from mobile home manufacturers...
translation.zh: 这些信在东京能卖个好价钱…

translation.en: What happens with the kids who wrote the letters?
translation.zh: 那些写信的孩子们会怎么样？

translation.en: They just don't get what they want for Christmas.
translation.zh: 他们得不到想要的圣诞礼物

translation.en: What? That's horrible.
translation.zh: 什么？那太惨了

translation.en: No, I think you missed it. I get money.
translation.zh: 不 我觉得你没理解 我得到钱

translation.en: Making money off of Christmas?
translation.zh: 靠圣诞节赚钱？

translation.en: That's crazy.
translation.zh: 这样太疯狂了

translation.en: Thank you, boy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 孩子

translation.en: Your shouted words have inspired me to change--
translation.zh: 你的怒吼启发了我改变…

translation.en: Yay, it's a Christmas miracle.
translation.zh: 这是圣诞节的奇迹

translation.en: --my business model.
translation.zh: …我的商业模式

translation.en: When Santa doesn't deliver and children weep,
translation.zh: 当圣诞老人没有送礼物 孩子们哭泣

translation.en: parents will do anything to get them their toys,
translation.zh: 家长会不惜一切为孩子买礼物

translation.en: even buy them from me at a huge markup.
translation.zh: 甚至从我这里高价买礼物

translation.en: Don't you use my ideas for evil.
translation.zh: 你不能用我的主意干坏事

translation.en: You turned my letters into a nutcracker in ten seconds?
translation.zh: 你在十秒内把我的信变成了胡桃夹子？

translation.en: -No. -[Noth] No, him.
translation.zh: -没有-不 他

translation.en: Five seconds.
translation.zh: 五秒钟

translation.en: Ten is for lazy toymakers who are not Dongle.
translation.zh: 懒惰的玩具制造者才需要十秒钟

translation.en: I like his style.
translation.zh: 我喜欢他的风格

translation.en: I've devised a deal.
translation.zh: 我想好了一个交易

translation.en: I'll charter that flight,
translation.zh: 我来开飞机

translation.en: but Dongle stays with me to make 10,000 toys for profit.
translation.zh: 但是铛戈留下做一万个玩具卖钱

translation.en: No, we're not leaving Dongle.
translation.zh: 不 我门不会丢下铛戈

translation.en: Go save your brother with the handsome face
translation.zh: 用你这张戴上眼镜会更帅的脸

translation.en: that would look better in glasses.
translation.zh: 去救你的弟弟吧

translation.en: Dongle will catch up.
translation.zh: 铛戈很快会跟上的

translation.en: -You sure? -Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: -你确定吗？-圣诞快乐

translation.en: You press that button, Dongle will get you out of any jam.
translation.zh: 你按这个按钮 铛戈就会来救你

translation.en: Mostly toy-building jams. That is where the button is of most use.
translation.zh: 主要是玩具制造中遇到的麻烦那是按钮的主要用途

translation.en: -Thank you, Dongle. -Okay, this hug is done.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 铛戈-好了 抱过了

translation.en: I'm going to the North Pole.
translation.zh: 我要去北极了

translation.en: How do you handle the excitement of being at the real North Pole?
translation.zh: 怎么应对身处真正的北极时的激动心情？

translation.en: You don't.
translation.zh: 不用应对

translation.en: It looks like Baby Corp.
translation.zh: 看上去就像宝贝企业

translation.en: [Jimbo] But Christmas-ier.
translation.zh: 但是更有圣诞节气氛

translation.en: Let's go over the plan.
translation.zh: 我们重温一下计划

translation.en: Me and Tim look for Boss.
translation.zh: 我和提姆去找老板

translation.en: I'll find what they're using to jam our chupie transport tech, and smash it.
translation.zh: 我去找找他们用什么干扰了小皮传输技术 然后摧毁它

translation.en: Got that, Tim?
translation.zh: 记住了 提姆？

translation.en: I'm at the North Pole.
translation.zh: 我在北极

translation.en: Can you keep it together?
translation.zh: 你能不能正常点？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I'm actually in Santa Town. I'm gonna...
translation.zh: 我真的来到圣诞老人的家了 我要…

translation.en: Um, hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Anyone home?
translation.zh: 有人在家吗？

translation.en: Anyone making toys?
translation.zh: 有人在做玩具吗？

translation.en: Anyone Santa?
translation.zh: 有圣诞老人吗？

translation.en: It's gingerbread.
translation.zh: 是姜饼

translation.en: Jimbo. Don't eat the toy factory--
translation.zh: 金宝 不要吃玩具工厂…

translation.en: Dang, break me off some of that wall.
translation.zh: 真好吃 给我也分一点

translation.en: Stop chewing. I hear actual North Pole Christmas Cheer.
translation.zh: 别嚼了我听到真正的北极圣诞欢呼了

translation.en: Then Santa said, "Thanks, Tippy Tappy Slappy."
translation.zh: 然后圣诞老人说“多谢 踢皮塔皮疏拉比”

translation.en: But I'm not Tippy Tappy Slappy. I'm Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.zh: 但是我不是踢皮塔皮疏拉比我是踢皮塔皮疏落皮

translation.en: Ugh. Breaks my heart.
translation.zh: 我太伤心了

translation.en: Who's got another complaint about Santa's mismanagement?
translation.zh: 关于圣诞老人的管理不当谁还有投诉？

translation.en: There's the boss. Hi.
translation.zh: 老板在那儿 嗨

translation.en: We should have suggestion boxes, but we don't.
translation.zh: 我们应该设意见箱 可是没有

translation.en: So how do we suggest we get one?
translation.zh: 所以是不是应该设一个？

translation.en: What did you do?
translation.zh: 你做了什么？

translation.en: Uh, good to see you too.
translation.zh: 我也很高兴见到你

translation.en: Where's the fun and jolly toy making? This is Santa's factory.
translation.zh: 那些有趣的玩具制造场面呢？这里可是圣诞老人的工厂

translation.en: Really? It's Santa who clocks in? Santa who carves the horsies?
translation.zh: 真的吗？圣诞老人打卡上班吗？他雕刻小木马吗？

translation.en: Santa spring-loading jack-in-the-boxes?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人亲手安装惊喜盒子的弹簧吗？

translation.en: You're messing with Christmas.
translation.zh: 你在破坏圣诞节

translation.en: It's a mess. I'm cleaning it up.
translation.zh: 已经是一团糟了 我在处理烂摊子

translation.en: Christmas is perfect. Everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.zh: 圣诞节很完美大家都喜欢圣诞老人和小精灵

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt.
translation.zh: 对不起 打扰了

translation.en: We're trying to recall Santa's nicknames, but couldn't remember.
translation.zh: 我们在想圣诞老人的外号可是想不起来了

translation.en: Can you help us?
translation.zh: 你能帮我们吗？

translation.en: Sure, Santa, Santa Clause, St. Nick, Kriss Kringle, Father Christmas--
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 圣尼克克里斯克林格尔 圣诞老公公…

translation.en: Cool, cool.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -Now name an elf. -What?
translation.zh: -说一个精灵的名字-什么？

translation.en: You said, everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.zh: 你说过大家都喜欢圣诞老人和小精灵

translation.en: You know every single one of Santa's nicknames.
translation.zh: 你知道圣诞老人的所有外号

translation.en: Surely you know just one of our names.
translation.zh: 你肯定也知道我们的名字

translation.en: Blitzen?
translation.zh: 布里森？

translation.en: Blitzen? Blitzen?
translation.zh: 布里森？

translation.en: Kid's confusing us with those antlered stink horses?
translation.zh: 他把我们和那些长着角的臭马混为一谈了？

translation.en: You done did it now.
translation.zh: 你干的好事

translation.en: [PoopyDoopy] I'm done being a cog in the Christmas wheel.
translation.zh: 我受够了默默无闻

translation.en: A wheel we probably made.
translation.zh: 我们为他辛苦打工

translation.en: [shouts] Santa's factory? Ha!
translation.zh: 圣诞老人的工厂？

translation.en: This is our factory.
translation.zh: 这是我们的工厂

translation.en: [elves] Yeah!
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人？

translation.en: How long have you been-- What did you hear?
translation.zh: 你有多久…你听到了什么？

translation.en: Enough.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: All I wanted was to make everyone happy.
translation.zh: 我只是想让大家都开心

translation.en: Well, you sure blew that.
translation.zh: 你搞砸了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [elf] We should get better than this.
translation.zh: 我们应该得到更好的待遇

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I hope I can do better next year.
translation.zh: 我希望明年能做得更好

translation.en: -[elves gasping] -[PoopyDoopy] Not the naughty list.
translation.zh: （圣诞老人） 不可能在淘气名单上

translation.en: Santa.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人

translation.en: There he is. On his sleigh.
translation.zh: 他在那儿 坐在雪橇上

translation.en: -I can't believe it. -I know.
translation.zh: -难以置信-就是

translation.en: He teleported to a sleigh that would take two minutes to walk to.
translation.zh: 他瞬移到了雪橇上如果走路需要两分钟

translation.en: Explains the, uh... [grunts]
translation.zh: 这就解释了…

translation.en: No, I can't believe he's gone.
translation.zh: 不 真不敢相信他竟然走了

translation.en: Santa can't go on the naughty list. He's Santa.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人不能在淘气名单上他是圣诞老人

translation.en: Why does it feel like a man cave on Mother's Day?
translation.zh: 这里怎么感觉像是母亲节的男人世界？

translation.en: A re-org like this usually takes weeks.
translation.zh: 重组通常需要几个星期

translation.en: We should be celebrating.
translation.zh: 我们应该庆祝一下

translation.en: Yeah, get it.
translation.zh: 快来庆祝吧

translation.en: We had a misunderstanding.
translation.zh: 我们之间有点误会

translation.en: Got the chupies working. Let's jet.
translation.zh: 小皮修好了 走吧

translation.en: Look at that. Still time to play fruitcake lacrosse.
translation.zh: 看看 还有时间玩水果蛋糕长曲棍球

translation.en: -Hockey. -One of those boarding school sports.
translation.zh: -是曲棍球-寄宿学校的运动之一

translation.en: What about Santa? What happens with Christmas?
translation.zh: 那圣诞老人怎么办？圣诞节呢？

translation.en: These elves got it covered.
translation.zh: 交给小精灵就行了

translation.en: Uh... Not really.
translation.zh: 不太行

translation.en: This was about recognition for making toys.
translation.zh: 本来只是想因为制造玩具被认可

translation.en: Delivering them is Santa's thing. Because, you know, the sleigh.
translation.zh: 送礼物是圣诞老人的工作因为你也知道 驾驶雪橇

translation.en: This isn't a Santa problem. It's a logistics problem.
translation.zh: 这不是圣诞老人的问题是物流的问题

translation.en: Call in the paper pushers.
translation.zh: 呼叫纸推人

translation.en: Simmons, Hendershot. On my location.
translation.zh: 席梦思 韩德厦宝宝 到我的位置

translation.en: Is this the secret Christmas Party? Bring on the nog.
translation.zh: 这是秘密圣诞节派对吗？狂欢吧

translation.en: -[both chanting] Nog, nog, nog-- -I got something better than nog.
translation.zh: 狂欢… 我有更好的东西

translation.en: We're gonna solve Christmas toy delivery logistics.
translation.zh: 我们要解决圣诞节礼物的物流问题

translation.en: One fire dog, coming up.
translation.zh: 着火的热狗来了

translation.en: This stump taken?
translation.zh: 这树墩有人坐吗？

translation.en: Santa? Why are you--?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人？你为什么…

translation.en: Is this about the naughty list?
translation.zh: 是关于淘气名单吗？

translation.en: That snowball to the kisser should've sealed the deal.
translation.zh: 扔雪球那次就应该已经确定了

translation.en: No one is questioning your naughtiness, or mine.
translation.zh: 没有人怀疑你的淘气 或者我的

translation.en: Whoa, you finally made the jump?
translation.zh: 哇 你终于行动了

translation.en: Danny, you've been on my naughty list
translation.zh: 丹尼 从你可以自主放屁开始

translation.en: since you were old enough to pass gas at will.
translation.zh: 你就一直在我的淘气名单上

translation.en: Continue.
translation.zh: 继续

translation.en: I joined the list 20 minutes ago, and I feel like crud.
translation.zh: 20分钟前 我也加入了那个名单我感觉很丢人

translation.en: But here you are, happy as a clam, roasting hot dogs on a fire--
translation.zh: 可是你还是这么快乐 烤着热狗…

translation.en: Is that last year's bundle of coal?
translation.zh: 这是去年的那几块煤炭吗？

translation.en: Doesn't that taste like--
translation.zh: 味道像不像…

translation.en: West Virginia?
translation.zh: 西弗吉尼亚？

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: So how do we live with ourselves when we've been so naughty?
translation.zh: 我们这么淘气 怎么忍受自己呢？

translation.en: Papa Noel, I'm glad you asked.
translation.zh: 诺亚老爹 你这样问我很欣慰

translation.en: First get rid of this idea that naughtiness is bad.
translation.zh: 首先不要觉得淘气是件坏事

translation.en: Naughty living is very healthy and very normal.
translation.zh: 淘气的生活是健康而且正常的

translation.en: What? You just...
translation.zh: 什么？你刚…

translation.en: Got my veggies in the naughtiest way.
translation.zh: 用淘气的方式得到蔬菜

translation.en: Nice needs naughtiness like night needs day
translation.zh: 乖巧需要淘气 就像夜晚需要白天

translation.en: and turtles need shells to hide their eyes during scary movies.
translation.zh: 乌龟需要壳才能在看恐怖电影时闭上眼睛

translation.en: Give a naughty man a hotdog, he'll have a hotdog.
translation.zh: 给淘气的人一个热狗他就会得到一个热狗

translation.en: But teach a naughty man to hotdog, and he'll have a ton of hotdogs.
translation.zh: 但是教一个淘气的人做热狗他就会有无数热狗

translation.en: [man] My ear lobe.
translation.zh: 我的耳垂

translation.en: Don't forget, every Christmas morning,
translation.zh: 别忘了 每一个圣诞节清晨

translation.en: naughty kids wake up to coal, which is dead dinosaurs.
translation.zh: 淘气的孩子醒来会得到煤块那是死去的恐龙

translation.en: So while nice kids play with toys...
translation.zh: 当乖孩子玩玩具时…

translation.en: ...we're playing with dead dinosaurs.
translation.zh: 我们在玩死去的恐龙

translation.en: And that's rad.
translation.zh: 那简直太酷了

translation.en: [Tippy Tappy Sloppy] Approaching target. Open flaps.
translation.zh: 接近目标 张开翅膀

translation.en: Opening flaps.
translation.zh: 张开翅膀

translation.en: And release.
translation.zh: 放

translation.en: Yes, Templeton?
translation.zh: 怎样 天普顿？

translation.en: What makes you think you can do Christmas without Santa?
translation.zh: 你凭什么觉得没有圣诞老人也能过圣诞？

translation.en: Uh, the fact that we are.
translation.zh: 因为我们马上要这么做

translation.en: Let's get industrial fans,
translation.zh: 我们去拿工业风扇

translation.en: make sure she can handle monsoons in the South Pacific.
translation.zh: 要确保她能应付南太平洋的季风

translation.en: This isn't the same. You need magic and wonder.
translation.zh: 这不一样 你需要魔法和奇迹

translation.en: Or Christmas is just a bonus birthday with a tree.
translation.zh: 要不然圣诞节不过是额外的一个有树的生日

translation.en: Yes, but you will get a lot of toys.
translation.zh: 没错 但是你会得到很多玩具

translation.en: -Toys. -Toys.
translation.zh: -玩具-玩具

translation.en: -Toys. -Toys.
translation.zh: -玩具-玩具

translation.en: There's more to Christmas than toys.
translation.zh: 圣诞节不单单有玩具

translation.en: It's how awesome it is to see boot marks on snowy roofs.
translation.zh: 还有看到屋顶上靴子印的惊喜

translation.en: -See if we can fake boot marks. -On it.
translation.zh: -看看能不能假造靴子印-马上

translation.en: It's seeing Santa's cookies gone, except a half-eaten one.
translation.zh: 是看到为圣诞老人准备的饼干不见了只留下吃剩的半块

translation.en: Kids pick it up like, "Santa's teeth touched this."
translation.zh: 孩子们会拿起来说“圣诞老人的牙碰过它”

translation.en: You're holding on to Christmas past. This is Christmas future.
translation.zh: 你在怀念圣诞节的过去这是圣诞节的未来

translation.en: Satisfaction guaranteed.
translation.zh: 保证满意

translation.en: All sales final.
translation.zh: 货物售出概不退换

translation.en: Ha. Silly Gingergoose.
translation.zh: 愚蠢的姜饼鹅

translation.en: Hello, animal that is not a dog.
translation.zh: 你好 不是狗的动物

translation.en: Dongle, where have you been?
translation.zh: 铛戈 你去哪儿了？

translation.en: The usual. Living the most incredible life.
translation.zh: 跟往常一样 过着非同一般的生活

translation.en: Who's your friend?
translation.zh: 你的朋友是？

translation.en: My chisel is my friend.
translation.zh: 凿子是我的朋友

translation.en: My sander is my confidant.
translation.zh: 砂光机是我的知己

translation.en: This one gave me a ride. We are not friends.
translation.zh: 它是我的坐骑 不是朋友

translation.en: We're also not enemies. We're next to each other.
translation.zh: 也不是敌人 只不过挨着我

translation.en: -Any more questions? -Yeah, where are my hollyberries?
translation.zh: -还有问题吗？-还有 我的冬青果呢？

translation.en: No more questions from you. But one from Dongle.
translation.zh: 你不能再问了 铛戈可以提问

translation.en: Where is the big man?
translation.zh: 他去哪儿了？

translation.en: This is all wrong.
translation.zh: 这都不对

translation.en: Your fellow elves fighting for recognition is wrong?
translation.zh: 你们这群精灵为被认可而战是错的？

translation.en: No, if anyone loves recognition, it's Dongle.
translation.zh: 不 要说谁喜欢被认可 那就是铛戈

translation.en: You are Dongle.
translation.zh: 你是铛戈

translation.en: I recognize you.
translation.zh: 我认识你

translation.en: Santa does more than bring toys Dongle makes.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人不仅仅送出铛戈做的礼物

translation.en: He brings people together, makes people feel good.
translation.zh: 他把人们聚在一起 让他们开心

translation.en: Told you.
translation.zh: 告诉过你了

translation.en: The world is changing. It's time Christmas catches up.
translation.zh: 世界在改变 圣诞节也要跟上

translation.en: How you sleep at night?
translation.zh: 你晚上睡得着吗？

translation.en: Guilt won't work on me.
translation.zh: 我从不会有愧疚感

translation.en: Does Dongle look like a disappointed grandmother?
translation.zh: 铛戈像一个失望的奶奶吗？

translation.en: Simple question. How you go to sleep?
translation.zh: 简单的问题 你怎么睡觉？

translation.en: Like every hardworking baby American.
translation.zh: 和所有勤劳的美国宝贝一样

translation.en: Tucked into a firm swaddle with a belly full of milk
translation.zh: 喝饱了牛奶 裹好了睡袋

translation.en: and a night-night kiss from Mommy and/or Daddy.
translation.zh: 再来一个爸爸妈妈给的吻

translation.en: Night-night kiss is unnecessary, no?
translation.zh: 晚安吻没有必要是吗？

translation.en: You are tired, full, swaddled. You fall asleep no matter what.
translation.zh: 你很累 吃饱了 裹好了睡袋怎么样也会睡着的

translation.en: I don't need the kiss, but I like--
translation.zh: 我不需要吻 但是我喜欢…

translation.en: Oh, you led me right into that.
translation.zh: 是你说的

translation.en: Christmas without Santa is like bedtime without night-night kiss.
translation.zh: 没有圣诞老人的圣诞节就像没有晚安吻的夜晚

translation.en: No one wants that.
translation.zh: 不会有人喜欢的

translation.en: Fine, you're all big elves. You want Santa back? Go get him.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们是大精灵想要圣诞老人回来？去找他吧

translation.en: No, you go.
translation.zh: 不 你去

translation.en: No chance. Why me?
translation.zh: 不可能 为什么是我？

translation.en: Because from what you tell Dongle, the Christmas man, he left in bad shape.
translation.zh: 因为从你告诉铛戈的事来看圣诞老人离开时很难过

translation.en: Hollow on the inside, like a grocery store chocolate nutcracker.
translation.zh: 内心空虚就像超市的巧克力胡桃夹子

translation.en: He asks himself, "Who am I anymore?"
translation.zh: 他问自己“我到底是谁？”

translation.en: [Dongle] You break a Santa, you got to fix a Santa.
translation.zh: 你击碎了圣诞老人 你要把他修好

translation.en: -When you break a Santa this bad, -[snoring]
translation.zh: 你把圣诞老人伤得这么深

translation.en: only one thing can put his heart back together:
translation.zh: 只有一件事能修复他的心

translation.en: Seeing a bah-humbug stinker like you find the Christmas spirit.
translation.zh: 看到你这样的小坏蛋爱上圣诞精神

translation.en: You will go get Santa.
translation.zh: 你去找圣诞老人

translation.en: And what happens if I don't?
translation.zh: 要是找不到呢？

translation.en: Singing.
translation.zh: 唱歌

translation.en: -Excuse me? -Hit it.
translation.zh: -再说一遍-来吧

translation.en: ♪ He's vicious ♪
translation.zh: 他很凶

translation.en: ♪ He's twisted ♪
translation.zh: 他很扭曲

translation.en: ♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
translation.zh: 他是小老板

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝要毁灭

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝要毁灭圣诞节

translation.en: Ooh. Catchy hook.
translation.zh: 很顺口

translation.en: Yeah, throw in some verses and a bridge,
translation.zh: 再来点段子和过渡

translation.en: I bet we could get the whole world singing this.
translation.zh: 这首歌肯定能火

translation.en: Please, don't.
translation.zh: 别这样 拜托了

translation.en: [Diddly Doo] ♪ He came to the North Pole And started fussing ♪
translation.zh: 他来到北极开始大闹

translation.en: ♪ Made Santa cry With all his cussing ♪
translation.zh: 他出言不逊 把圣诞老人惹哭

translation.en: [Lala] ♪ He took Father Christmas All sweet and loved ♪
translation.zh: 他把善良受尊重的圣诞老公公

translation.en: ♪ And showed him just where He could shove it ♪
translation.zh: 撇到一旁

translation.en: [both] ♪ He's vicious ♪
translation.zh: 他很凶

translation.en: ♪ He's twisted ♪
translation.zh: 他很扭曲

translation.en: ♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
translation.zh: 他是小老板

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
translation.zh: 他要毁灭

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 他要毁灭圣诞节

translation.en: This song makes me wanna dance.
translation.zh: 这首歌让我想跳舞

translation.en: And get rid of our Christmas-ruining baby.
translation.zh: 把我们这个毁灭圣诞节的宝贝丢掉

translation.en: [Diddly Doo] ♪ On Christmas morn All the kids did weep ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞节的早晨孩子们因为没有收到礼物

translation.en: ♪ For not a single toy Lay beneath their feet ♪
translation.zh: 嚎啕大哭

translation.en: [both] ♪ And just in case you forgot his name ♪
translation.zh: 万一你忘了他的名字

translation.en: ♪ The baby who we all should blame ♪
translation.zh: 我们都应该指责的孩子

translation.en: ♪ Theodore Leslie Templeton ♪
translation.zh: 西奥多林赛天普顿

translation.en: ♪ Shame, shame, shame ♪
translation.zh: 羞耻

translation.en: ♪ Christmas burned down ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞节被毁了

translation.en: ♪ And he lit the flame ♪
translation.zh: 他点燃火焰

translation.en: I love this song and hate this baby.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这首歌 讨厌这个宝贝

translation.en: ♪ He's vicious ♪
translation.zh: 他很凶

translation.en: ♪ He's twisted ♪
translation.zh: 他很扭曲

translation.en: ♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
translation.zh: 他是小老板

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝要毁灭

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝要毁灭圣诞节

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Promise me that song never leaves this room, and I'll go get him.
translation.zh: 答应我不要把这首歌外传 我去找他

translation.en: But we still have a problem.
translation.zh: 但还有个问题

translation.en: I'd get him, but I don't know where he is.
translation.zh: 我去找他 但是我不知道他在哪儿

translation.en: [Noth] I can find him.
translation.zh: 我可以找到他

translation.en: I'm the Noth Pole.
translation.zh: 我是诺斯波

translation.en: He gives me creepy motel check-in vibes.
translation.zh: 他让我想到住黑店的场景

translation.en: Can you really find Santa?
translation.zh: 你真的能找到圣诞老人？

translation.en: Yes, for a price.
translation.zh: 当然了 只要价钱合适

translation.en: I want the letters to Santa.
translation.zh: 我要写给圣诞老人的信

translation.en: -All of them. -[Tim] No way.
translation.zh: -所有的信-不可能

translation.en: Santa needs those to know what every kid wants.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人需要那些信这样才知道每个孩子的愿望

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing children's letters.
translation.zh: 我想帮你 但是我要记住孩子们的信

translation.en: If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.zh: 如果记不住就要花好几个星期去送礼物

translation.en: Deal. You can have every letter.
translation.zh: 成交 信都给你

translation.en: [all] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: That's it. Every letter.
translation.zh: 就这样 每一封信

translation.en: We did our part. You do yours.
translation.zh: 我们做到了 该你了

translation.en: The smiling red one lurks at the mall in your hometown.
translation.zh: 穿红衣服的微笑的人在你家乡的商场

translation.en: I'll remember none of you.
translation.zh: 你们谁我也记不住

translation.en: -[shouts] -Go.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: I can't help it. One more time. Two, three, four.
translation.zh: 我忍不住 再来一次 二 三 四

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝要毁灭

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝要毁灭圣诞节

translation.en: Ron?
translation.zh: 罗恩？

translation.en: You here?
translation.zh: 你在吗？

translation.en: Yo, Ronny.
translation.zh: 喂 罗恩

translation.en: [groans] Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人

translation.en: Time to go.
translation.zh: 该走了

translation.en: Boss Baby?
translation.zh: 小老板？

translation.en: But if someone like you would come for me,
translation.zh: 你这样的人能来找我

translation.en: it's never too late to change things.
translation.zh: 要做出改变还不算晚

translation.en: There's no amount of naughtiness the Christmas spirit can't--
translation.zh: 不管多淘气 圣诞精神都能…

translation.en: Gonna cut you off before you embarrass yourself worse than that outfit does.
translation.zh: 趁你没有做出比你的外套更丢脸的事快点停下

translation.en: I'm only here because if I don't bring you back,
translation.zh: 我来这儿是因为如果我不把你带回去

translation.en: two pint-size hitmakers are gonna smear my good name all over the Top 40.
translation.zh: 那两个搞音乐的小家伙就要在排行榜里破坏我的名声

translation.en: Diddly Doo and Lala Doo-Da?
translation.zh: 滴滴里嘟和拉拉杜达？

translation.en: I thought the elves were all mad at me because of how naughty I've been.
translation.zh: 我还以为小精灵们都因为我淘气而讨厌我呢

translation.en: You're not naughty,
translation.zh: 你不淘气

translation.en: just stuck in your ways, and grossly inefficient.
translation.zh: 只不过太固执 效率太低了

translation.en: What do you pay in reindeer maintenance for one night of use?
translation.zh: 为了一晚上的使用你要花多少钱来维护驯鹿？

translation.en: Can't you lease?
translation.zh: 你不能租用吗？

translation.en: But for reasons beyond me, the elves want you back for Christmas.
translation.zh: 虽然我不能理解 精灵们想要你回去

translation.en: -And what about you? -What?
translation.zh: -那你呢？-什么？

translation.en: What do you want for Christmas?
translation.zh: 你想要什么圣诞礼物？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Hey, I'm stuck in my ways.
translation.zh: 嘿 我很固执

translation.en: You want something from Santa? Ask. I don't make the rules.
translation.zh: 你想要圣诞老人送你礼物吗？说吧规矩不是我定的

translation.en: You absolutely make the...
translation.zh: 你绝对…

translation.en: [groans] Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I got it. I got it.
translation.zh: 我够得着

translation.en: -Come back to the North Pole. -What, little boy?
translation.zh: -回北极去吧-什么 小宝贝？

translation.en: [yelling] I'd like you to come back to the North Pole.
translation.zh: 我想让你回到北极

translation.en: Santa can do that for you.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人帮你实现

translation.en: I think we just had a Christmas spirit breakthrough.
translation.zh: 我想我们实现了圣诞精神的突破

translation.en: Is this what it feels like?
translation.zh: 是这种感觉吗？

translation.en: I also want a tie clip, a gold one with wings on it.
translation.zh: 我还想要一个领带夹 金色带翅膀的

translation.en: And one of those electric shoe polishers you see in golf club locker rooms.
translation.zh: 还有在高尔夫球场更衣室见到的那种电子擦鞋器

translation.en: And gift cards. They're tacky, but it's like plastic money.
translation.zh: 还有礼品卡 虽然很俗气但那就像塑料钱

translation.en: That's what the Christmas spirit is.
translation.zh: 这才是圣诞精神

translation.en: Asking for things you don't need and don't have time to get.
translation.zh: 要自己不需要而且没时间买的东西

translation.en: -No. -Well, hey, you tried.
translation.zh: -不-嘿 你努力了

translation.en: You have the worst catchphrase.
translation.zh: 你的标语是最差劲的

translation.en: Yeah? What's yours?
translation.zh: 是吗？你的呢？

translation.en: Oh. I was trying to make "fart poop doody" work, but...
translation.zh: 本来想试试“吓屎宝宝了”可是…

translation.en: [groans] Do your dumb laugh.
translation.zh: 你就傻笑吧

translation.en: You've been busy.
translation.zh: 你很忙嘛

translation.en: Santa, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 对不起

translation.en: It was everyone else who messed with all the stuff--
translation.zh: 都是别人捣乱的…

translation.en: -I like it. -I helped.
translation.zh: -我喜欢-我也帮忙了

translation.en: Dongle. It's jolly to see you.
translation.zh: 铛戈 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Dongle is a comforting presence.
translation.zh: 铛戈能来真是太好了

translation.en: A gift from all of us.
translation.zh: 是我们所有人的礼物

translation.en: But don't worry, Dongle made it.
translation.zh: 别担心 是铛戈做的

translation.en: A Baby Corp monitor? Um--
translation.zh: 是宝贝企业的监控器？

translation.en: Press the talky button.
translation.zh: 按下说话按钮

translation.en: I'm Baby Corp.
translation.zh: 我是宝贝企业

translation.en: I'm incompetent.
translation.zh: 我是无能的

translation.en: First rule of business, I'm dumb.
translation.zh: 第一条规定 我是笨蛋

translation.en: Second rule, I forgot, because I'm dumb.
translation.zh: 第二条 我记性差 因为我是笨蛋

translation.en: Look at the bottom.
translation.zh: 看下面

translation.en: [Santa] "Dongle"?
translation.zh: “铛戈”？

translation.en: We put our names on everything,
translation.zh: 我们把名字写在所有东西上

translation.en: so the children know why they weep with joy when they get a Dongle toy.
translation.zh: 所以孩子们知道为什么收到铛戈制造的礼物时会高兴到哭

translation.en: It's not the way things have always been done, but...
translation.zh: 以前不是这样做的 但是…

translation.en: If the way things are always done leaves people unhappy, who needs it?
translation.zh: 如果过去的方式让大家不高兴为什么还要保留？

translation.en: It's perfect. I'm sorry I didn't think of this years ago.
translation.zh: 这样很好 抱歉没有早点想到

translation.en: Anyone know if this is edible?
translation.zh: 你们谁知道这个能吃吗？

translation.en: It's that late?
translation.zh: 已经这么迟了吗？

translation.en: [Jimbo] It's not edible.
translation.zh: 不能吃

translation.en: We don't have time. What have I done?
translation.zh: 没时间了 我都干了什么？

translation.en: I'll never get the presents out tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚的礼物送不完了

translation.en: Is this guy's name Santa or Can't-a?
translation.zh: 他是叫“圣诞老人”还是“不行”？

translation.en: Efficiency, Ron. Still got those gifts memorized?
translation.zh: 效率 罗恩 还记得那些礼物吗？

translation.en: Do I? TWCAFIJ.
translation.zh: 我记得吗？提想按浴加动人

translation.en: Tim Wants Canadian Action Figure in Jacuzzi.
translation.zh: 提姆想要按摩浴缸里的加拿大动作人偶

translation.en: He's got them.
translation.zh: 他还记得

translation.en: -Yeah! -[elves cheering]
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Elves, Baby Corp,
translation.zh: 精灵们 宝贝企业

translation.en: let's Christmas.
translation.zh: 我们来圣诞吧

translation.en: -Like "let's do this" but-- -We got it. We just don't like it.
translation.zh: -就像“我们开始吧”不过…-明白 可是不喜欢

translation.en: -[shouts] -Let's Christmas.
translation.zh: 我们圣诞吧

translation.en: -Yeah! -[all cheering]
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Release.
translation.zh: 放

translation.en: -Toys. -Toys.
translation.zh: -玩具-玩具

translation.en: -Toys. -Toys.
translation.zh: -玩具-玩具

translation.en: I'd like your most expensive pinky ring.
translation.zh: 我想要你们最贵的小指戒指

translation.en: Let's just say I've got enough letters
translation.zh: 这么说吧 我手头的信

translation.en: to fill vending machines from Miyazaki to Hokkaido.
translation.zh: 可以把从宫崎到北海道的自动售货机填满

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [Tim] Dear Noth, stop selling letters.
translation.zh: 亲爱的诺斯 不要再卖信了

translation.en: It's not nice.
translation.zh: 这样不好

translation.en: Here's a present, anyway. Love, Tim.
translation.zh: 这是给你的礼物 爱你 提姆

translation.en: The scary broken toy I wanted as a kid, but never got.
translation.zh: 我从小就想要却没得到过的恐怖破娃娃

translation.en: Mom, Dad?
translation.zh: 妈妈 爸爸？

translation.en: It's Kyle.
translation.zh: 我是卡尔

translation.en: [girl 1] A ten-speed bicycle from Ding Dong Dongle, and it's made from wood.
translation.zh: 来自叮咚铛戈的十速自行车还是用木头做的

translation.en: [girl 2 in French] Jingly Jangly made my teddy bear.
translation.zh: 清铃珍莉给我做的泰迪熊

translation.en: [boy] A baseball mitt.
translation.zh: 棒球手套

translation.en: And Tippy Tappy Sloppy the Elf made it.
translation.zh: 是小精灵踢皮塔皮疏落皮做的

translation.en: Lucky the kids got Mom's genetics, because Dad is a pile of yikes.
translation.zh: 还好孩子们长得像妈妈因为爸爸真是太丑了

translation.en: [boy] Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人？

translation.en: -[paper ripping] -[gasps] A yo-yo.
translation.zh: 一个悠悠球

translation.en: Made by PoopyDoopy the Elf?
translation.zh: 是小精灵波比多比做的？

translation.en: Thank you, Santa and PoopyDoopy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 圣诞老人和波比多比

translation.en: I love it, and promise to share with everyone.
translation.zh: 我太喜欢了 我会和别人分享的

translation.en: How do we get past the kid?
translation.zh: 我们怎么绕过孩子？

translation.en: -You sick St. Nick. -[boy snoring]
translation.zh: 你这个狡猾的圣尼克

translation.en: I can't believe I delivered presents with Santa.
translation.zh: 不敢相信我竟然和圣诞老人一起发礼物

translation.en: Every last one.
translation.zh: 一个不剩

translation.en: Free of charge.
translation.zh: 免费

translation.en: Oh, please, I helped.
translation.zh: 拜托 我帮了忙的

translation.en: Doesn't mean I'll dump my portfolio and move to a commune.
translation.zh: 不意味着我要放弃投资策略搬进公社

translation.en: Thank you, Santa.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 圣诞老人

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: So, what lame teachable gift
translation.zh: 你有什么俗套的说教

translation.en: that sums up this whole experience do you have for me?
translation.zh: 来总结这段经验？

translation.en: Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Nothing?
translation.zh: 没有吗？

translation.en: Don't you want me to get the Christmas spir--? Ow!
translation.zh: 你不是想让我感受圣诞精…？

translation.en: They call me MC Christmas.
translation.zh: 他们叫我圣诞主持

translation.en: The C also stands for Christmas.
translation.zh: C也代表圣诞节

translation.en: -Ted, it's Christmas morning. -What?
translation.zh: -泰德 现在是圣诞节早晨了-什么？

translation.en: We forgot to make snack leis. We'll starve during fruitcake hockey.
translation.zh: 我们忘了做零食花环玩水果蛋糕曲棍球的时候会饿坏的

translation.en: We'll ruin our sweet little guy's first traditional Templeton Christmas.
translation.zh: 我们会把小家伙的第一个传统天普顿圣诞节搞砸的

translation.en: What if he isn't into the traditional Templeton Christmas?
translation.zh: 万一他不喜欢传统天普顿圣诞节呢？

translation.en: They're family traditions. Our family's different now.
translation.zh: 那是我们家的传统我们的家现在不同了

translation.en: If the way we always do things makes one of us unhappy,
translation.zh: 如果传统让某个人不高兴

translation.en: let's do different things.
translation.zh: 那就做点不一样的事

translation.en: -I could come up with new ideas. -Family brainstorm.
translation.zh: -我可以想想新的活动-全家大脑总动员

translation.en: What are fun words that rhyme with "wreath"?
translation.zh: 和花环押韵的有意思的词有哪些？

translation.en: Santa gave me snack leis, so this tradition is back on.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人给了我一个零食花环我们要继续传统

translation.en: [both] Fruitcake hockey in the driveway.
translation.zh: 在停车道上玩水果蛋糕曲棍球

translation.en: -We'll get the sticks. -Wrap the baby in sofa cushions.
translation.zh: -我们去拿球棍-拿沙发垫把宝贝裹起来

translation.en: Your mom plays violent.
translation.zh: 你们的妈妈打球很猛

translation.en: I'll talk them out of that.
translation.zh: 我会劝他们别玩那个

translation.en: You don't have to throw out every tradition for me.
translation.zh: 不必为我放弃传统

translation.en: You'll do fruitcake hockey and snack leis?
translation.zh: 你玩水果蛋糕曲棍球和零食花环？

translation.en: This wearable choking hazard? No.
translation.zh: 这个会让我不小心吞食的东西？不

translation.en: But I'll play your holiday dessert Canadian stick game.
translation.zh: 但是我可以玩节日甜点加拿大棍子游戏

translation.en: -You will? -It's nonsense.
translation.zh: -你愿意？-虽然让人莫名其妙

translation.en: But it can't be all bad if it brings people together, and gets you all smiley.
translation.zh: 但是如果能让大家聚在一起开心一下未尝不可

translation.en: Just like Santa.
translation.zh: 就像圣诞老人

translation.en: I guess. I mean, if you squint and don't think about it--
translation.zh: 也许吧 如果眯上眼睛不去想…

translation.en: No. Feeling Christmas spirit. [shouts]
translation.zh: 不 我感觉到圣诞精神了

translation.en: [Tim] Goal!
translation.zh: 进球！

translation.en: [Danny gasps] I got a sock full of dead dinosaurs.
translation.zh: 我收到一袜子的死恐龙

translation.en: Merry Christmas to all.
translation.zh: 祝所有人圣诞快乐

translation.en: The end.
translation.zh: 讲完了

translation.en: That was in no way a "make us fall asleep" story.
translation.zh: 这可不是“让我们睡着”的故事

translation.en: -I have so many questions. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我有很多问题想问-对呀

translation.en: Wasn't your setup about why we should do goofy traditions even if we don't want to?
translation.zh: 你想说的不是我们为什么一定要做那些传统项目吗？即使我们不想

translation.en: You bailed on that with your brother.
translation.zh: 你没有为你的弟弟做到这一点

translation.en: -Then he did some, but not others. -What's the takeaway?
translation.zh: -他做了其中一些 不是全部-这究竟是什么道理？

translation.en: Want easy lessons? Go to kindergarten.
translation.zh: 想听简单的道理吗？去上幼儿园吧

translation.en: -[Tina] Can I? -Not until you're 5. Go to sleep.
translation.zh: -我能去吗？-等你到了五岁再说吧 快睡觉

translation.en: -Five? -How?
translation.zh: -五？-怎么？

translation.en: You opened a Pandora's box of moral ambiguity.
translation.zh: 你打开了寓意模糊的潘多拉魔盒

translation.en: Can we go to the zoo if I don't make fun of the capybaras?
translation.zh: 如果我不取笑水豚 能去动物园吗？

translation.en: You grew up big and weird.
translation.zh: 你长得真大 真奇怪

translation.en: Okay, all done. Dongle kill kids.
translation.zh: 好了 铛戈要干掉小孩子

translation.en: Very funny.
translation.zh: 很好笑

translation.en: Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice--
translation.zh: 骗我一次 算你可耻 骗我两次…

translation.en: Dongle is serious. The big one deserved it.
translation.zh: 铛戈是认真的 大女儿活该

translation.en: She stopped feeding the Christmas Panda and it died.
translation.zh: 她没有给圣诞熊猫喂食 结果它死了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Dongle tricked you again for drama.
translation.zh: 铛戈又唬到你了

translation.en: You are welcome for the spice of life.
translation.zh: 免费给你的生活增添乐趣 不用谢

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: [adult Tim] Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐
